title: Please add MIT license
body:
Hi there,

Great video!  A permissive license like MIT or BSD would be appreciated.
author: kattkieru

comments.body: Oh, sure! I didn't thought of that. I'll add it. But feel free to fork it, hack it, and generally have fun with it in any way you like.
Amazing, thank you!  Looking forward to your takes on span sorting, sprites, BSP, and actual portals. :)
